= vim-iced-neil

image:https://img.shields.io/badge/iced-plugin-blue.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,["vim-iced plugin", link="https://github.com/liquidz/vim-iced"]

https://github.com/liquidz/vim-iced[vim-iced] plugin to add support for https://github.com/babashka/neil[babashka/neil].

NOTE: This plugin is heavily inspired by https://github.com/babashka/neil/blob/main/neil.el[neil.el].

== Usage

E.g. Add https://github.com/weavejester/medley[medley/medley] to your deps.edn.
[source,vim]
----
:IcedNeil medley
----
